values.title: AA Milne
values.desc: Rivers know this there is no hurry We shall get there some day

values.title: Moliere
values.desc: Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit

values.title: Benjamin Franklin
values.desc: He that can have patience can have what he will

values.title: Lewis Carroll
values.desc: No, no! The adventures first explanations take such a dreadful time

values.title: Aristotle
values.desc: Patience is bitter but its fruit is sweet

values.title: Leo Tolstoy
values.desc: The strongest of all warriors are these two - Time and Patience

values.title: Paulo Coelho
values.desc: Why is patience so important Because it makes us pay attention

values.title: Neil Gaiman
values.desc: Everybody going to be dead one day just give them time

values.title: Shikamaru Nara
values.desc: There's no advantage to hurrying through life

values.title: Louisa May Alcott
values.desc: Be worthy love, and love will come

values.title: Margaret Thatcher
values.desc: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end

values.title: DH Lawrence
values.desc: She was always waiting, it seemed to be her forte

values.title: Elizabeth Taylor
values.desc: It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time the greater our capacity for waiting
